source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GREETING_MNAAGO_000_000<tab>Let's each do our best, eh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GREETING_MNAAGO_000_000<tab>おつかれさまです、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
これから、いっしょに頑張っていきましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GREETING_MNAAGO_000_001<tab>Much obliged for all the help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The soldiers' families give you their thanks as well.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GREETING_MNAAGO_000_001<tab>おつかれさまです、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
給付金を贈った遺族の方々から、続々と感謝の声が届いてますよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GREETING_MNAAGO_000_002<tab>Bugger me, being a merchant's a lot more tiring than I ever imagined! How you holding up, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GREETING_MNAAGO_000_002<tab>いらっしゃいませ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
私も商売人らしくなってきたと思いませんか？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GREETING_MNAAGO_000_003<tab>For the ones we left behind, and for the ones we've still got to look after. Let's do some good today, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GREETING_MNAAGO_000_003<tab>いらっしゃいませ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
戦没者遺族のため、そして家族のため、今日も頑張りますよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GREETING_MNAAGO_000_004<tab>You've a heart of gold, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We could have never come this far without you.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GREETING_MNAAGO_000_004<tab>毎度ありがとうございます、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
戦没者遺族のため、そしてアラミゴ解放軍のため、
今日も張り切っていきましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>何をする？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>Make a delivery (<var 20 E803 /var> remaining).
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>依頼品を渡す（<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>：残り<var 20 E803 /var>回）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>Learn about custom deliveries.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>「お得意様取引」について聞く

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>What would you learn more about?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>Satisfaction level.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>メ・ナーゴの信頼度について

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>Delivery requirements and rewards.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>納品の条件と報酬について

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>Procuring collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>依頼品の入手方法

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>Acquiring materials.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>製作の「素材」の入手について

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>Increasing the value of crafted collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>収集価値の上げ方について（製作編）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>Increasing the value of gathered collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>収集価値の上げ方について（採掘・園芸編）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>Increasing the value of fish.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>収集価値の上げ方について（漁師編）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_001_000<tab>With each successful delivery, M'naago will come to trust you more and more, leading her to task you with assignments of greater importance.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_001_000<tab>依頼品を納品することで、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>のあなたに対する信頼度は、
少しずつ上昇していきます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_001_001<tab>This will be displayed in the form of a gauge atop the Custom Deliveries list. Fill this gauge to the maximum, and M'naago's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─as represented by little golden hearts─will increase.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_001_001<tab>現在の信頼度は、依頼品リスト上部のゲージに表示され、
これが最大まで溜まることで、「信頼ランク」が上昇します。
なお、信頼ランクはハートマークの数で表現されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_001_002<tab>Upon reaching a new <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, you will have the opportunity to learn more about M'naago and the families of the fallen Resistance fighters.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_001_002<tab>また、信頼ランクが上昇する際には、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>にまつわる、
新たなストーリーを見ることができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_007_000<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 60 or above.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_007_000<tab>納品は、アイテムの種類に応じたクラスになり、
そのクラスのレベルが60以上の場合、
納品することができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_007_001<tab>If you are level 89 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 90 scrips reward.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_007_001<tab>納品時、クラスのレベルが89以下の場合は、
レベル90時のスクリップ報酬の代わりに、
経験値報酬を得られます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_002_000<tab>Should you find yourself unsure as to how to procure a particular item, subcommands and item descriptions can point you in the right direction.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_002_000<tab>依頼品リストのアイテムの入手方法を調べたい場合は、
サブコマンドやアイテムヘルプを活用しましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_002_001<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the recipe for the item in question.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_002_001<tab>「クラフター全般」の場合、リストを選択した状態で、
サブコマンド「製作方法を検索」を実行すると、
製作手帳が開き、製作レシピが表示されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_002_002<tab>Likewise, for Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_002_002<tab>「採掘師」と「園芸師」の場合、リストを選択した状態で、
サブコマンド「採集方法を検索」を実行すると、
採集手帳が開き、採集場所が示されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_002_003<tab>For knowledge on fish, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Display Location<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the map of the relevant fishing hole.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_002_003<tab>「漁師」の場合、リストを選択した状態で、
サブコマンド「入手場所の表示」を実行すると、
該当の魚を入手できる釣り場・漁場が示されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_102_003<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_102_003<tab>なお、釣りを行う際は、
釣り餌に「<var 28 ((Item)) F26FDA01 /var>」を使うとよいでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_002_004<tab>The items sought by M'naago fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, M'naago deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_002_004<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>へ納品できるアイテムは、
「クラフター全般」と「採掘師／園芸師」、「漁師」の3種になり、
それらはすべて「収集品」である必要があります。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_003_000<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables M'naago seeks may be purchased from the material supplier on the west side of Rhalgr's Reach.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_003_000<tab>依頼品の製作に必要な素材は、
ここラールガーズリーチの西側にいる、
「素材屋」から購入可能です。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_004_000<tab>The collectability of crafted items is directly related to their quality. Spare no effort in ensuring that the items you craft are of the highest possible quality, and you will be rewarded accordingly.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_004_000<tab>クラフターの製作品の「収集価値」は、
製作時に「品質」を高めることで、上昇します。
そのため、できるだけ品質を高めて完成させることが重要です。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_004_002<tab>The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Inner Quiet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status, granted each time you successfully increase quality, will serve you particularly well.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_004_002<tab>品質が上がるアクションに成功すると、
自身に「インナークワイエット」が付与されていきます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_004_003<tab>To be deleted.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_004_003<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_004_004<tab>Stack as many of the status as you can, then put the final flourish on your masterpiece with <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Byregot's Blessing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_004_004<tab>できるだけ多くのインナークワイエットを蓄積させておき、
最後に「ビエルゴの祝福」などで、
一気に品質を上げてから完成させるといいでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_004_005<tab>There are a host of other actions that can serve to further enhance the quality of items you craft. Once you've mastered the fundamentals, you are encouraged to experiment with varied approaches until you find your preferred crafting approach.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_004_005<tab>他にも、品質を上げるために有用なアクションは存在します。
慣れてきたら、いろいろと試して自分なりの製作パターンを、
模索してみるとよいでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_005_000<tab>Before gathering a collectable item, you must increase its collectability.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_005_000<tab>収集品採集アイテムを選ぶと、特殊なウィンドウが表示されます。
収集品採集用アクションを使い、
「収集価値」を上げてから、アイテムを採集します。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_005_001<tab>One technique miners and botanists may employ to raise collectability is the use of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scrutiny<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scour<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Try executing this combination a few times before gathering the item.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_005_001<tab>「採掘師」と「園芸師」で収集価値を上げるには、
アクション「集中検分」を使用したのち、「純化」を使用します。
これを繰り返し、収集品アイテムを採集してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_005_002<tab>Gatherers seeking to procure items with higher collectability must be certain to equip gear with higher <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gathering<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> ratings, as these attributes influence the effectiveness of actions that raise collectability.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_005_002<tab>より高い収集価値を狙う場合は、
装備を整えて、「獲得力」「技術力」を高めてみましょう。
収集品採集用アクションの効果が高くなります。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_005_003<tab>Of course, these actions cannot be used to their full potential without sufficient <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>GP<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. A healthy balance of all three attributes is essential to make the most of your gathering.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_005_003<tab>「GP」が不足しているようであれば、
装備を整えて、「GPmax」を高めてみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_006_000<tab>The collectability value of fish follows a simple rule─the bigger, the better.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_006_000<tab>水産物は釣った「魚のサイズ」が、
そのまま「収集価値」となります。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_006_001<tab>Upon arriving at the fishing hole where your desired quarry resides, use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collect<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> action, then begin fishing.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_006_001<tab>収集品として求められている魚がいる釣り場へ行き、
アクション「収集品採集」を使い、釣りを開始しましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_006_002<tab>From there, using <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience II<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by effective hooking actions will increase your chances of reeling in a big one.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_006_002<tab>アクション「ペーシェンスII」を使ったあと、
適切なフッキングアクションを選ぶことで、
大きな魚を狙うことができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_006_003<tab>Should you still find yourself catching only small fry, try outfitting yourself with better equipment to raise your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_GUIDE_006_003<tab>サイズが思ったように上がらない場合は「技術力」を、
装備を整えて高めてみましょう。

Furthermore, M'naago deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>Information on how to find individual items may be found in the following manner:
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>また、納品するアイテムの入手方法については、
それぞれ以下の方法で調べることができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TUTORIAL_100_005<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TUTORIAL_100_005<tab>なお、釣りを行う際は、

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>The higher an item's collectability, the greater the reward you will earn from M'naago upon successful delivery.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>それぞれの納品アイテムは「収集価値」が高いほど、
納品時の報酬を多く得ることができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>To learn more about collectables and how to increase collectability, speak with M'naago and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Learn about custom deliveries<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>「収集価値の上げ方について」知りたい時には、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>に話しかけて、
「『お得意様取引』について聞く」を選んで確認しましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>In making your first successful delivery, you have begun to earn M'naago's trust.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>依頼品を納品したことで、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>は、あなたの事を信頼し始めました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>With each successful delivery, M'naago will grow more and more satisfied with your efforts. Fill the gauge completely and M'naago's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, giving you the opportunity to learn more about your business partner.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>納品時に得られる「信頼度」の蓄積を示すゲージが、
最大まで溜まると、「信頼ランク」が上昇し、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の新たなストーリーを見ることができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>You can make up to six deliveries in a given week. Deliver the items M'naago needs, and deliver them often to win the trust and praise of your new business partner!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>また、1週間で最大6回まで納品することが可能です。
積極的に収集品の納品を行い、
信頼ランクを上昇させていきましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>You have reached the weekly limit for deliveries. You may begin again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>今週分の納品権を、すべて消費しました。
（地球時間）毎週<var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((日)) ((月)) ((火)) ((水)) ((木)) ((金)) ((土)) /var>曜日の<var 08 E0DB0D ((午後)) ((午前)) /var><var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0102030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 01 /var>時に、納品権が付与されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_001_000<tab>Ah, so you've brought me some Gyr Abanian souvenirs? Good, good. For all they preach about not being wasteful, they sure don't seem to mind wasting gil.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_001_000<tab>依頼させていただいたギラバニアの名産品ですね！
グリダニアでは珍しい品ばかりですから、
きっと取引もうまくいきますよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_001_001<tab>Far Eastern “antiques,” is it? Damned if I know how you can craft an antique, but the collectors don't seem to pay it any mind. If anything, this sort seems to appeal more.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_001_001<tab>なんとも異国情緒の漂う品ですね！
これが東方の風情というものなのでしょうか……。
きっと好事家さんたちのお眼鏡にもかないますよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_001_002<tab>Not everybody can walk away from the Saucer with a fabulous prize. Some people even prefer these─and there are even others who won't ever bother to visit but like to pretend they did. Or maybe they've got some other reason for buying them? Who knows.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_001_002<tab>楽しげで煌びやかな品々……。
ゴールドソーサーでの想い出の品として、
注目を集めること、間違いなしですね！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_001_003<tab>Hah! One glance is all it takes for the memories to come flooding back. Never had a knack for weaving, but it's never too late to learn, I suppose...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_001_003<tab>伝統的な狩猟生活を続けるメ族に、
必要な品々ばかりで、とても助かります！
きっと、父も母も姉妹たちも喜びますよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_001_004<tab>You're a godssend─and that's no exaggeration either! I can't even begin to tell you how many ways we can put this materiel to good use...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_001_004<tab>解放のための戦いは終わりましたが、
解放を維持するための活動は、まだまだ続きます。
これらの軍需品、しっかり役立てますよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_002_000<tab>Starcrack sand, is it? Superstitions notwithstanding, it has an aesthetic appeal that even our neighbors to the west can appreciate. Much obliged.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_002_000<tab>ギラバニア特有の金砂「<var 28 ((Item)) E80201 /var>」ですね！
壊神ラールガーが砕いた星の欠片と詠われる美しさ……
この品質の金なら、グリダニアでも重用される事でしょう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_002_001<tab>These days, more than a few Eorzeans have a fascination with all things Hingan bordering on obsession. Well, so long as they pay for their koban, I'll have no qualms indulging them!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_002_001<tab>保存状態の良い「<var 28 ((Item)) E80201 /var>」ですね！
こうした古銭を収集している好事家さんたちは、
多いと聞きますから、いい取引材料になりそうです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_002_002<tab>Some of the more educated collectors say that the Near Eastern influences are quite prominent in these designs. I don't know about that, but I do know that plenty of people are happy to pay good gil for them. Or MGP, as it were.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_002_002<tab>コッター朝時代の古びた宝飾品ですね！
近東風の意匠が用いられているのが特徴的で、
変わり種の景品として、人気が出そうです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_002_003<tab>Can never have too much pigment, many of our tribe's elders would say. Not that I need to tell an adventurer that! Aye, I've heard stories of how some of you lot go through enough dye to put a sultana to shame!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_002_003<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) E80201 /var>」は、
メ族の伝統的な染め物に使われる顔料です。
衣装作りに欠かせない品ですから、喜ばれますよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_002_004<tab>I could go on about the myriad uses of this root─mostly medicinal, mind─but let's just say we'll put it to good use.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_002_004<tab>とっても滋養のありそうな「<var 28 ((Item)) E80201 /var>」ですね！
アラミゴ伝統の獣の角を使った薬茶もいいですが、
植物由来の薬茶も重宝するんですよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_003_000<tab>My mother practically raised me on grilled Gyr Abanian chubs. Here's hoping the Gridanians appreciate this taste of home as much as I did as a child.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_003_000<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) E80201 /var>」は地元ではお馴染みの魚です。
母が作るチャブの焼き料理は、本当に美味しいんですよ。
故郷の味を、グリダニアの方々にも伝えてあげたいですね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_003_001<tab>They really do look just like a piece of coral, don't they? I can see why collectors seek them out for their aquariums.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_003_001<tab>まるで珊瑚のような美しい色合い……。
観賞魚として人気な理由が、一目瞭然ですね！
きっと好事家さんたちのお眼鏡にもかないますよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_003_002<tab>Little buggers may be hardy, but they need just the right conditions to form the shapes people prefer. At a glance, it seems you've brought a promising specimen...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_003_002<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) E80201 /var>」は温帯でも育っちゃう逞しいマリモです。
形の整っている個体は少なくて、当たり外れが激しい品ですが、
これは大当たりですね！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_003_003<tab>Seems like you've got a good catch there! A skilled chef could cook it à la meunière...but me? Well, I suppose I could blacken it over coals or a cookfire. Edible, sure, but I can't vouch for the taste.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_003_003<tab>なんて立派な「<var 28 ((Item)) E80201 /var>」……！
これのムニエルは絶品で、みんなの大好物ですよ！
まあ‥…私が作ると真っ黒焦げになっちゃうんですけど……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_003_004<tab>Now this is sure to please Orella. Nothing's better for soldiers on the mend than a hearty serving of turtle soup.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_KNOWLEDGE_MNAAGO_003_004<tab>とっても元気な「<var 28 ((Item)) E80201 /var>」ですね！
栄養価が高くて、傷病兵の滋養強壮に役立つんです。
きっと、オレラ女史も喜んでくれますよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_JUDGEMENT_MNAAGO_000_000<tab>Now then, on closer inspection... No glaring imperfections or otherwise. Solid work that passes muster. As befits an artisan such as yourself.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_JUDGEMENT_MNAAGO_000_000<tab>それでは、僭越ながら納品物を拝見させていただきます。
なるほど……この手堅い安定した品質、流石ですね！
腕利き職人の仕事というもの見せていただきました！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_JUDGEMENT_MNAAGO_000_001<tab>Now then, on closer inspection... Better than many such items that've passed through my hands. Even someone with my limited experience can tell the difference. Well done!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_JUDGEMENT_MNAAGO_000_001<tab>それでは、僭越ながら納品物を拝見させていただきます。
これは……見事としか言いようがない品質ですね！
私のような新米の目にも違いは一目瞭然です！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_JUDGEMENT_MNAAGO_000_002<tab>Now then, on closer inspection... Bugger me, you don't see something like that every day. Hells, you're lucky to see something like that once in a blue moon! I don't know what you're doing, but keep it up!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_JUDGEMENT_MNAAGO_000_002<tab>それでは、僭越ながら納品物を拝見させていただきます。
な、なんと……これは逸品と呼ぶに相応しい品質ですよ！
解放者は、職人としても超一流なんですね！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_JUDGEMENT_MNAAGO_000_003<tab>You've my heartfelt thanks for these, and my parents' besides. I'd like to think the tribe is doing all right these days, but every bit helps.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_JUDGEMENT_MNAAGO_000_003<tab>それでは、僭越ながら納品物を拝見させていただきます。
……おお、なんて出色の逸品でしょう！
きっと、メ族のみんなも気に入るはずです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_JUDGEMENT_MNAAGO_000_004<tab>The fight never ends, friend─it just changes. The Resistance is still needed all across Gyr Abania, and contributions like yours are invaluable. Thank you!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_JUDGEMENT_MNAAGO_000_004<tab>それでは、僭越ながら納品物を拝見させていただきます。
……これは、なんとも目覚ましい品ですね！
解放軍の日々の大きな助けになってくれそうです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>Unable to obtain your reward. Your inventory is full.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>所持品に空きがないため、信頼ランク上昇の報酬を、
受け取ることができません。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>To collect your reward, make room in your inventory and speak with M'naago once more.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>所持品を空けてから、<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>に話しかけてください。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_BEFRANKUP_MNAAGO_000_000<tab>Thank you so much for all your help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I think we've got enough goods to satisfy my Gridanian clients─or better yet, whet their appetite for even more!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_BEFRANKUP_MNAAGO_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、ご協力ありがとうございます！
おかげさまで、たくさんのギラバニアの名産品が集まりました。
これならきっと、グリダニアの好事家の目を引くはずです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_BEFRANKUP_MNAAGO_001_000<tab>That ought to do it for now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Give me a moment to add this to our next outgoing shipment...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_BEFRANKUP_MNAAGO_001_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、ご協力ありがとうございます！
おかげさまで、たくさんの東方風の収集品が集まりました。
さっそく、ウルダハの富豪に売り込みに行きますよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_BEFRANKUP_MNAAGO_002_000<tab>And with that, I reckon we've got more than enough for our needs! Here's hoping the folks at the Saucer are satisfied with the quality of our work...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_BEFRANKUP_MNAAGO_002_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、ご協力ありがとうございます！
おかげさまで、たくさんのゴールドソーサーの景品が集まりました。
この景品があれば、遊技場も盛り上がること請け合いです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_BEFRANKUP_MNAAGO_003_000<tab>Thank you so much for all your help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I think it safe to say that the tribe will be overjoyed to receive these supplies...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_BEFRANKUP_MNAAGO_003_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、ご協力ありがとうございます！
おかげさまで、メ族の日用品が集まりました。
これだけあれば、メ族のみんなも随分と助かることでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_000<tab>The Gridanian collectors send their warmest regards, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The items you provided were quite well received, I'm told.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんが納品してくれた、
「ギラバニアの名産品」は、グリダニアの好事家に大人気でした！
滅多に手に入らなかった品々だけに、とても重宝されたようです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_001<tab>Thanks to the contributions of you and others, we've earned enough gil to start providing payments to some of the bereaved families. In fact, a young woman from one such family is here today and would like to say a few words.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_001<tab>そして、まとまった資金ができたので、
さっそく戦没者遺族に給付金を贈りました。
ちょうど、お礼が言いたいという方が、いらっしゃっていますよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_GERMAINNE_001_002<tab>My name's Germainne, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>... I joined the Resistance together with my father, but when the imperials attacked the Reach, he was killed...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_GERMAINNE_001_002<tab>どうも、ゲルメインヌと申します。
私は親子で解放軍に所属していましたが、
父が戦死して……それで、給付金をいただいたんです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_GERMAINNE_001_003<tab>I'm grateful for what you're doing, I am. I won't deny it's been hard ever since he passed, but I wasn't expecting anything, nor do I think I deserve it...but thank you all the same.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_GERMAINNE_001_003<tab>その際、メ・ナーゴさんから、解放者である貴方が資金作りのために、
協力してくださっていると聞き、是非、お礼の言葉をと思いまして。
この度は、どうもありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_GERMAINNE_001_004<tab>I didn't want to be a soldier when I was little. I wanted to learn things, get an education. Didn't work out that way on account of the occupation, of course. That's why Father and I joined the fight.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_GERMAINNE_001_004<tab>私は、幼い頃から学問の道に進むことを夢見てきました。
しかし、帝国支配下の属州民に、自由なんてあるはずもなく、
父と解放運動に参加し、戦い続けてきたんです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_GERMAINNE_001_005<tab>But now that the occupation's ended, I've been thinking... When Ala Mhigo needed soldiers, I became one, but now Ala Mhigo needs learned men and women. So I'm thinking that's what I'll use your gil to finally become. Thank you for this opportunity, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_GERMAINNE_001_005<tab>ですが、解放が成ったいま、夢を阻むものはありません。
これからは勉学に励み、学問で解放軍とアラミゴの役に立ちたい。
給付金は、そのための書物や筆記用具に使わせていただきます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_006<tab>Zenos himself cut her father down when he came to the Reach that day. From what I heard, he died giving his daughter a chance to escape.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_006<tab>ゲルメインヌの父親は、ラールガーズリーチが、
ゼノスたちの襲撃を受けた際、彼女をかばって戦死したんです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_007<tab>We all had to make choices that day. I was wounded, so I chose to flee with Krile and some few others. But I wanted to stay and fight─I told him, I screamed at him...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_007<tab>あの襲撃のとき、
私は負傷したことで、クルルさんと先に脱出しました。
本当は最後まで残ると言い張ったんですがね……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_008<tab>But Meffrid, he wouldn't hear it. So he stayed, and I ran. I lived, and he died.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_008<tab>でも、メッフリッドに説き伏せられて脱出したんです。
そして、戦場に残った彼が……。
本当に仲間想いの闘士でした。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_009<tab>Came to light recently that he had family too. A wife and child. He never mentioned them before, so I had no idea...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_009<tab>そういえば、最近知ったことなのですが、
メッフリッドには妻子がいたそうです。
生前はそんな素振り、まったく見せなかったんですけどね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_010<tab>I'd like to help them like the other families, but we don't know where they got to, or even if they're still alive. But we'll keep on searching until we do.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_010<tab>死んでいった彼のためにも、給付金を贈ってあげたいのですが、
所在がわからないので、探している最中です。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_011<tab>In the meantime, I'll have to content myself with helping those I can─and I do hope I can continue to count on you for assistance.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_011<tab>さて、おかげさまで今回の給付金は、
ほかの戦没者遺族の方々にも喜んでもらえました。
どうもありがとうございます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_012<tab>This is but the first step on an endless road. Full many of our friends died, and we owe it to them to do right by their loved ones.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_012<tab>しかし、これで終わりではありません。
戦いで死んでいった仲間たちはまだまだいる。
そして、その遺族の方もたくさんいらっしゃいます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_013<tab>And we will, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─I know we will! Where there's a will, there's a way!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_013<tab>この事業は始まったばかりなのです。
どうか、これからもご協力のほど、よろしくお願いします！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_000<tab>It's even better than we hoped, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Those Ul'dahn collectors did their best to outbid each other for our Far Eastern collectables.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんに納品してもらった、
「東方風の収集品」が、ウルダハの富豪に飛ぶように売れました！
それもみんな、驚くほどの高値で買い取っていただけましたよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_001<tab>The proceeds far exceeded our expectations. We've enough to expand our operations and start looking after even more families.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_001<tab>あっという間にまとまった資金ができたので、
ふたたび戦没者遺族に給付金を贈りました。
そして、またもお礼が言いたいという方が来ているんです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_WOMAN00434_002_002<tab>Excuse me, I'm... Well, no one of consequence, really. It was my son who fought and died for the Resistance...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_WOMAN00434_002_002<tab>どうも、初めまして。
私は名乗るほどの者ではありません。
戦死した解放軍のいち闘士の母親です。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_WOMAN00434_002_003<tab>I came to thank you for your kindness and generosity, especially at a time like this when everyone should be looking to bigger and more important challenges, like the rebuilding of our great nation.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_WOMAN00434_002_003<tab>この度は本当にありがとうございます。
国の復興で大変なときに、給付金をいただけるなんて、
思ってもみませんでした。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_WOMAN00434_002_004<tab>My son liked to say that when the fighting was finished, he would become a merchant. He'd sell anything and everything so that he could earn money and look after me...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_WOMAN00434_002_004<tab>死んだ息子がよく言ってたんです。
解放が成し遂げられたら、商売を始めてお金を稼いで、
お母さんに楽させてあげるって……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_WOMAN00434_002_005<tab>I suppose, in a way, he is now...but I'd give it all up and more if I... I'm sorry, I don't mean any disrespect for what you've done for me and mine, but...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_WOMAN00434_002_005<tab>私には給付金が、そんな息子からの贈り物に思えてならないんです。
ごめんなさいね、あなたたちが苦労して、
工面してくれたというのに……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_WOMAN00434_002_006<tab>Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. Good day to you.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_WOMAN00434_002_006<tab>この度は本当に助かりました、それでは失礼します。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_007<tab>...Her son died when the main tower at Specula Imperatoris fell.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_007<tab>彼女の息子さんは、スペキュラ・インペラトリスの戦いで、
メインタワーの崩壊に巻き込まれて死んだんです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_008<tab>I was with Conrad before it happened─with him when he was urging those damn fool Skulls to lay down their arms and surrender. And he managed to do it! And then...and then...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_008<tab>あのとき、私はコンラッド隊長と共にいました。
隊長は抵抗を続ける髑髏連隊の若者を説得していましたが、
ようやく投降させた直後に帝国の砲撃でタワーが……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_009<tab>Part of me still wonders...after, did we owe it to them to try and save them too? To dig through the rubble and try to help the ones who were trying to kill us only moments before...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_009<tab>正直、私は裏切り者の髑髏連隊を説得してまで、
救おうとする必要があったのか……今でも疑問に思っています。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_010<tab>Conrad would've wanted it, I know. But he was in no state to give orders, and those of us that were, well...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_010<tab>コンラッド隊長は解放後のアラミゴのことを想い、
アラミゴ人同士に怨恨が広がらないよう努めていました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_011<tab>So he died, and they died. Conrad, our comrades. Enemies that surrendered, and those that didn't. Death all 'round and 'round.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_011<tab>それはわかるんですが、結果、隊長も仲間も犠牲となり、
投降させた髑髏連隊の若者も死んでしまった。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_012<tab>Not that any of us had even an inkling of what was coming. Would Conrad have spent all that time negotiating if he had─would he and full many others still be alive if he had─if, if, if, sodding if!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_012<tab>もちろん、突然の砲撃なんて予想もできなかったわけですが……。
あのとき、説得に時間を費やしていなければ、
隊長も仲間も無事だったのではと思わずにいれないんです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_013<tab>...Sorry. No use dwelling on it. Best to look to the here and now. To what good we've done, and what more we can do.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_013<tab>……すみません、取り留めもない話をしてしまいましたね。
おかげさまで、今回も戦没者遺族の方々に喜んでもらえました。
どうもありがとうございます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_014<tab>All this talk about Conrad...don't know if you knew, but he had a wife. I've not taken any gil to her yet─reckon she's like to refuse until she knows the others are being looked after, so I thought it best to wait.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_014<tab>ところで、コンラッド隊長には奥様がいらっしゃいまして、
次に資金ができたとき、給付金を直接お渡ししにいくつもりです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_015<tab>When the time comes, though...perhaps we ought to go and see her together.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_015<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんも、
コンラッド隊長とは浅からぬ縁。
そのときは、ご同行してもらえたら幸いです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_000<tab>Good news, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! The consolation prizes we sold to the Gold Saucer turned out to be more popular than we ever imagined!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんが納品してくれた、
「ゴールドソーサーの景品」。
大人気で、遊技場が白熱しているようですよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_001<tab>More profits means more aid for the families. In fact, we've got enough to go around now that I doubt Conrad's widow will object to taking some for herself.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_001<tab>おかげさまで、まとまった資金ができました。
以前にお伝えしたとおり、今回はコンラッド隊長の奥様に、
給付金を直接お渡ししに行くつもりです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_002<tab>Also...we found Meffrid's widow. I've a mind to visit the both of them to deliver their bit─and soon.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_002<tab>それに加えて、いつぞやにお話した、
メッフリッドの妻子の所在も掴めました。
そちらも訪ねて、給付金をお渡ししたいと思います。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_003<tab>Think I mentioned this to you before, but I was hoping you'd want to come with me when I do, on account of your connection.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_003<tab>メッフリッドも、コンラッド隊長も、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんとご縁がありました。
是非とも、ご同行していただければ幸いです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_004<tab>When you're up for it, let me know.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_004<tab>まずは一考していただき、同意してもらえるならば、
もう一度、声をかけてください。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_000<tab>Everyone in the village was overjoyed to receive our supplies! Both the quality and quantity surpassed their expectations!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんに納品してもらった、
「メ族の日用品」、
メ族のみんなに大好評で、とても助かったそうです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_001<tab>It puts my mind at ease to know that the tribe has what it needs, and that we'll be able to continue sending regular payments to the beneficiaries of our fund for the foreseeable future...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_001<tab>給付金の資金を集めながら、親孝行もできるなんて一石二鳥！
本当に、ありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_002<tab>Mother? What are you doing here in the Reach?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_002<tab>母さん！？
こんなところに来るなんて、いったいどうしたの？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MHAHTOA_004_003<tab>I know you're awfully busy with your duties and the fund, but there was something I wanted to say when you visited before, but couldn't.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MHAHTOA_004_003<tab>仕事中にごめんなさいね。
前は言い出せなかったんだけど、
どうしても、あなたに言いたいことがあったの……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MHAHTOA_004_004<tab>Come home, Naago. Ala Mhigo is free. You've done enough for these people. Come home and be with your family again.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MHAHTOA_004_004<tab>ねえ、ナーゴ。
アラミゴが解放されたのだから、一族の下に戻ってこない？
私はあなたに、一族とともに平穏な日々を過ごしてほしいのよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_005<tab>But Mother, I...I have responsibilities here...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_005<tab>か、母さん、私にはやることが……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MHAHTOA_004_006<tab>To the families of your comrades, I know. And I think what you're doing is wonderful, but...I worry you place their needs ahead of your own. You deserve to live your own life─to do what you want. What makes you happy.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MHAHTOA_004_006<tab>戦没者遺族への給付金事業のことね、素晴らしい試みだと思うわ。
でも……もう充分なんじゃないかしら？
あなたの人生を犠牲にしてまで続けなくても……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_007<tab>I am doing what makes me happy, Mother, don't you see? Helping these people in this way─and there's so much more we can do!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_007<tab>ごめんなさい、母さん。
給付金を渡すことができたのは、まだまだ一握りに過ぎないの。
それに、私は人生を犠牲にしているなんて思ってない。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_008<tab>I know it's not the life you had in mind for me. It's not what I had in mind when I was younger either. But after everything I've been through, everything I've shared with my brothers- and sisters-in-arms...I can't just walk away.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_008<tab>確かに、狩猟に生きるメ族の暮らしとは、あまりにも違うわ。
それでも、私は自らの意志で戦いに加わった以上、
死んでいった仲間たちに対して責任があるのよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_009<tab>It won't make up for what they've lost. No amount of gil weighs the same as a loved one's soul. But...it's better than nothing...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_009<tab>自分が、すべての遺族を救えるなんて、思ってはいないわ。
それでも、仲間たちの魂が安らげるよう、できる限りのことがしたい。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_016<tab>So no, I won't go back. This is the life I chose, and I've no regrets.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_016<tab>不器用かもしれないけど、これこそが私の人生よ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MHAHTOA_004_010<tab>...Still have that same fire in your eyes and steel in your voice you had when you said you wanted to join the Resistance. <sigh> Can't blame a mother for trying, can you?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MHAHTOA_004_010<tab>……やっぱり、あなたを説得することはできないようね。
私の反対を押し切って、解放軍に志願したときも、
今と同じ目をしていたもの……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MHAHTOA_004_011<tab>I respect your decision, and I'll say no more on it. All I ask is that you come and visit more. Much more.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MHAHTOA_004_011<tab>わかったわ、もう引き留めはしない。
でも、ひとつだけお願いがあるの。
これからは……もっと私に顔を見せにきてちょうだい。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_012<tab>I'll see what I can do, Mother.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_012<tab>母さん……。
うん……わかったわ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_013<tab>Well, that was...unexpected...though not entirely unwelcome. It's good to remember where you came from, and why you did what you did.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_013<tab>すみません、突然の母の登場には驚きましたが、
改めて自分の中にあった、この事業の初志を思い出しました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_014<tab>Anyway, now that we've finished with our efforts to help my village, I'd like to concentrate our efforts solely on doing what we can for the Resistance and the families in need.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_014<tab>これからも、私は死んでいった仲間たちのために、
困窮する遺族を給付金で支えていきたいと思います。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_015<tab>With your help, that is. Assuming I can still count on it?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_015<tab>しかし、それも<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんに、
私を「お得意様」にしていただいてこそのもの。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_017<tab>Whatever you're able and willing to provide is all I ask, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_017<tab>今後とも、末永くごひいきによろしくお願いします！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_100<tab>We did well with those Gridanian collectors, but we'll need to expand if we want to continue raising money for the fund. In short, I'd like to start dealing in Far Eastern collectables.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_100<tab>それでは、次に取引をお願いしたい収集品ですが、
ズバリ、「東方風の収集品」です。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_101<tab>Apparently, according to General Aldynn, there are a number of wealthy individuals in Ul'dah with a deep and abiding love for all things Hingan.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_101<tab>というのも、解放軍の総指揮官となった、
ラウバーン閣下とお話する機会がありましてね。
ウルダハの富豪の間で、東方風の物が流行っていると聞いたのです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_102<tab>It goes without saying that the Ul'dahn elite have more gil to spend than their Gridanian counterparts on average, so I expect we can turn a greater profit with this venture.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_102<tab>そして、グリダニアの好事家よりもウルダハの富豪の方が、
お金払いもいいと聞いたので、ここは狙い目だなと……。
フフフ、私も収集品取引をする者として強かになりますよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_103<tab>It'll be more work than before, but I know you're up to the task!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_103<tab>ということで……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
「東方風の収集品」の納品、よろしくお願いします！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_100<tab>Like before, I reckon it'd be for the best if we tried to trade in a more diverse range of collectables. Next, I'm thinking we ought to try our hand at consolation prizes from the Gold Saucer.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_100<tab>さて、次に取引をお願いしたい収集品ですが、
それは、「ゴールドソーサーの景品」です。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_101<tab>I trust you're familiar with the Saucer and its many delights? It's no secret, but in case you were unaware, it employs more than a few Ala Mhigans.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_101<tab>ウルダハの遊技場「ゴールドソーサー」はご存知ですか？
そこでは、たくさんのアラミゴ人が雇用されているんです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_102<tab>One of them happens to be a friend of mine. I mentioned the fund one day, and just like that, we got ourselves a new partner in crime.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_102<tab>その中には私の友人もいましてね、給付金のことを話したら、
是非とも協力したいと申し出てくれたんです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_103<tab>Let me explain. There are prizes available only at the Gold Saucer─commodities sold exclusively to them by certain select suppliers. We're now one of them, savvy?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_103<tab>ゴールドソーサーでは、
景品となる品を様々な商人から仕入れています。
その仕入れ先のひとつに、私も加えてもらうことになったんですよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_104<tab>I'll wager you didn't think a soldier like me had any truck with places like the Saucer, eh? Bet you're wondering if I might run off with our profits and spend it all on MGP and silly hats?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_104<tab>遊技場なんて私には縁がないと思ってましたが、
まさかこんな形で関わることになるとはね……。
納品のついでに遊んでみようかしら……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_105<tab>With hair like this? Like hells I will.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_105<tab>なんて冗談ですよ？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_106<tab>All right, enough talk. Let's get to work!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_106<tab>そういうわけで……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
「ゴールドソーサーの景品」の納品、よろしくお願いします！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_100<tab>So, I imagine you're wondering exactly what sort of deliveries I had in mind...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_100<tab>さて、これからの取引についてなのですが……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_101<tab>Frankly, I say why not focus on ourselves and what the Resistance could use? Materiel's always appreciated, among other things.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_101<tab>戦没者遺族のため、そして家族のため。
さらには「アラミゴ解放軍」のためにも、
私はこの事業を続けていこうと思います。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_102<tab>Rebuilding Ala Mhigo's going to take everything we can muster. Artisans like you will have a reliable client in us.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_102<tab>解放が成ってからも、勝ち取った自由を護り、
アラミゴを復興させるため、解放軍は活動していきます。
私もその一員として、収集品取引を役立てることにしました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_103<tab>Everything you've got and more, we'll take it!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_LCUT_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_103<tab>そういうわけで、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
これからも、収集品の納品をよろしくお願いします！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab>M'naago is pleased with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Supporter of the Resistance Widows and Orphans Fund<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の信頼ランクが上昇しました！
あなたの事を「給付金事業の協力者」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab>M'naago is delighted with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Benefactor of the Resistance Widows and Orphans Fund<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の信頼ランクが上昇しました！
あなたの事を「給付金事業の同志」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab>M'naago is overjoyed with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Savior of the Resistance Widows and Orphans Fund<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の信頼ランクが上昇しました！
あなたの事を「給付金事業の救い主」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab>M'naago could not be happier with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Champion of Widows and Orphans<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の信頼ランクが上昇しました！
あなたの事を「かけがえのない同志」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUPINFO_001_001<tab>And yet there is still much work to be done before the fund can provide sufficient aid to all the families of the deceased. To that end, M'naago has a new favor to ask of you...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUPINFO_001_001<tab>戦没者遺族への給付金事業を推進する<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>は、
あなたに新たな依頼をお願いしたいようです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUPINFO_001_002<tab>Through your efforts, the fund will provide substantial benefits to the families of the fallen Resistance fighters for some time. It seems, however, that M'naago has a different sort of favor to ask of you...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUPINFO_001_002<tab>戦没者遺族への給付金事業も軌道に乗ってきましたが、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>は、あなたに新たな依頼をお願いしたいようです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_AFTRANKUP_000_001<tab>The Custom Deliveries list for M'naago has been updated. To view the new list, speak with M'naago and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Make a delivery<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_AFTRANKUP_000_001<tab>新たな依頼によって納品リストが更新されました。
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>に話しかけて、
「依頼品を渡す」を選んで確認してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_AFTRANKUP_001_001<tab>A new quest continuing the story of the Resistance Widows and Orphans Fund is now available. Upon its completion, the Custom Deliveries list for M'naago will be updated.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_AFTRANKUP_001_001<tab>お得意様取引のストーリークエストが発行されました。
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>から受注してください。
クエストをコンプリートすることで、納品リストが更新されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_AFTRANKUP_002_001<tab>Future requests will be selected at random from all those you have seen thus far, with the list refreshed once a week (Earth time).
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_AFTRANKUP_002_001<tab>今後の依頼は、一週間に一度、
これまでの依頼品の中からランダムで選ばれます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_AFTRANKUP_002_002<tab>You may review the items currently in demand at any time by speaking with M'naago and selecting <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Make a delivery<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_AFTRANKUP_002_002<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>に話しかけて、
「依頼品を渡す」を選んで確認してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_AFTRANKUP_002_003<tab>Note that Resistance materiel, yellow kudzu roots, and purple bucklers will earn you particularly handsome rewards. Whenever they make an appearance, the effort to procure them will be worth your while.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_AFTRANKUP_002_003<tab>なお、「解放軍の軍需品」「黄葛根」
「パープルバックラー」については、多くの報酬が得られます。
リストに含まれていた場合は、積極的に納品してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_000<tab>Got to say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you've done more than your fair share for the fund.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_000<tab>たくさんの納品、ありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_001<tab>Wouldn't want to impose upon you further, not right now. Rest up and come 'round another time, all right?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_001_001<tab>さすがは腕利き職人ですね。
今後ともなにとぞ、よろしくお願いします！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_000<tab>I don't know how you can keep it up, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Honestly! You're a veritable fountain of endless energy.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_000<tab>今週もたくさんの納品、ありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_001<tab>But I'll not hear it said that I'm keeping you all to myself. You've got places to go and other people to help. Take care, and thanks again!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_002_001<tab>何かとお忙しい中、私などに時間を割いていただいて、
本当に感謝しています！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_000<tab>You're a godssend, you know that? All you've done for us, all you continue to do. There's no better word for it.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_000<tab>たくさん納品してくれて、どうもありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_001<tab>Still, I wager it's not entirely out of the kindness of your heart, eh? You enjoy the collectables trade─exhausting though it may be, there's still a solid sense of accomplishment. I know the feeling.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_001<tab>さすがに、お互い疲れてきましたね。
やはり、収集品取引も楽じゃないようです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_002<tab>But we both ought to know by now that it's important not to overdo it. Take a rest, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─you've earned it.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_003_002<tab>戦い続けるには、休息も必要ですから、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんも、
たまには、ゆっくり休んでくださいね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_000<tab>I've said it before, but I'll say it again: thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_000<tab>今日も納品、ありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_001<tab>At first I didn't quite understand what could drive wealthy collectors to spend gil hand over fist on fancy trinkets. But when I thought about the time and effort you poured into your craft, and me into mine, it started to make sense...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの品を見ていると、
好事家の方々が夢中になるのもよくわかります。
私も売ってしまうのが惜しいときすらありますからね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_002<tab>Anyway, let's you and me keep our noses to the grindstone!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_004_002<tab>収集品取引を始めたばかりの私ですが、
今後ともごひいきによろしくお願いします！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_005_000<tab>Ye gods, you're relentless! Like a machine at times, even!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_005_000<tab>いつも納品してくれて、ありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_005_001<tab>As for me, some of the lads were heard to say more...merchanty these days? Stubborn and hard-nosed as ever, but somehow in a more mercantile sense.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_005_001<tab>ところで、私も少しは商人らしくなってきたと思いませんか？
それもこれも、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんが、
私を「お得意様」にしてくれたおかげです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_005_002<tab>I suppose I ought to take it as a compliment. For the longest time I thought I only had hunting and soldiering in my veins, so it comes as a bit of a relief to find I've got a knack for something else...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_005_002<tab>戦うことと、狩りしか取り柄がありませんでしたが、
おかげさまで、私は商人として何とかやっていけています。
ふつつかものですが、これからもよろしくお願いします！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_006_000<tab>By Rhalgr, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Do you ever sleep, or do you just prefer to stay awake indefinitely putting us all to shame?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_006_000<tab>たくさんの納品、どうもありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_006_001<tab>Heh, now that I think on it, we've been doing this for quite some time now, haven't we?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_006_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんに協力していただくようになって、
もう随分と経ちましたね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_006_002<tab>I mean, the goal's still the same, but the fund's grown leaps and bounds beyond what I originally envisioned...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_006_002<tab>この事業の目的は、戦没者遺族に給付金を贈ること。
もちろん、それに変わりはありません。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_006_003<tab>It was only ever supposed to be a means to an end, you know? But somewhere along the line, I found myself taking joy in it all. Meeting new people, finding ways to satisfy their needs, watching them go home happy...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_006_003<tab>でも、いつしかそれだけじゃなく、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの素晴らしい品を、
様々な人に届けることも、私のひとつの喜びとなってきました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_006_004<tab>It's good, honest work, all the way through, and I hope to keep doing it for a good while yet─with your help, of course!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_RANKUP_MNAAGO_006_004<tab>これからも、素晴らしい逸品をお待ちしていますので、
どうか今後とも、末永くごひいきによろしくお願いします！

You may begin making deliveries again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER2_00434_AFTWEEKLY_000_000<tab>今週分の<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>への納品権を、すべて消費しました。
（地球時間）毎週<var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((日)) ((月)) ((火)) ((水)) ((木)) ((金)) ((土)) /var>曜日の<var 08 E0DB0D ((午後)) ((午前)) /var><var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0102030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 01 /var>時に、納品権が付与されます。
